description: Woodscape front camera calibration data converted for fisheye.js

notes.centerX: Converted from cx_offset (3.942 pixels) to normalized: (3.942 / 1280) * 2 = 0.006159375
notes.centerY: Converted from cy_offset (-3.093 pixels) to normalized: (-3.093 / 966) * 2 = -0.006404968
notes.distortionModel: radial_poly (4th order) - compatible with fisheye.js OpenCV model
